item.description:
In conjunction with the North-of-Boston Law of Attraction meetup group, I'd like to present the following - Manifest More using EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique)

Discover EFT and how it can help you attract what you desire by releasing negative energy.
The Law of Attraction is always in action yet; sometimes ‘various issues’ can get in the way of manifesting your true desires. That is why negativity only creates more negativity, causing you to think that the Law of Attraction is not working for you.
EFT is one of the modalities that Joe Vitale (of The Secret) recommends for clearing out negative feelings and doubts that can get in the way.


Hypnotists and other healing practitioners, for years, have been including EFT as part of their arsenal in helping clients overcome various issues. This perhaps, is because it is so easy to learn, and teach their clients.

You can learn more about EFT and other modalities at www.poseffects.com
PLEASE JOIN:
North-of-Boston Law of Attraction & Guest Speaker Kevin Martin (me) as we manifest more using EFT
WEDNESDAY, February 22, 2012
7:00-8:30 PM

Boston Theosophical Society in Arlington
Suggested donation: $5.00

Kevin will briefly explain, from a psychological and meta-physical point of view,
• How the Law of Attraction works
• Describe what can get in the way of it working
• How EFT can eliminate these obstacles
• Kevin will give a brief demonstration
• Teach everyone how to use this simple tool

Kevin Martin is a certified hypnotherapist and master practitioner of NLP (Neuro-Linguistic Programming). He is also a personal development author (Perceive This!), professional speaker and trainer. Kevin has been studying personal development of many forms for over 30 years. He has been a hypnotherapist for 9 years. Kevin’s website is www.poseffects.com An explanation of EFT can be found there.
Kevin A. Martin

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: Manifest More using EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique)
